description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Journal d'un voyage aux mers polaires, exécuté à la recherche de Sir John Franklin, en 1851 et 1852 ... Précédé d'une notice sur la vie et les travaux de l'auteur par M. Julien Lemer. [With the “Report” published in the “Annales maritimes,” a portrait and a map.]" Author: BELLOT, Joseph René. Contributor: LEMER, Jean Baptiste Raymond Julien. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10460.e.6." Page: 481 Place of Publishing: Paris Date of Publishing: 1854 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000264052 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
